txt.en: 'From this vantage point, I can see new standards flying in the valley below. These standards seem to indicate that my father may be seeking new allies to renew his fight.\n\n'Will you go down to Lhan Bach and tear down these standards? That, perhaps, will embolden the people against my father's tyranny.'
'With the banners removed from the village below, we have sent a clear message to my father's forces: their tyranny shall not be tolerated!'
'Have you torn down my father's banners?'
Heartened by the potential allegiance of the elders of Lhan Bach, Lhucu proposes a plan to liberate the village.
Treh√©arn Brenin's banners fly in Lhan Bach, south of Lhucu's hut.\n\nLhucu has asked you to tear down her father's standards that now hang throughout the village of Lhan Bach.
Talk to Lhucu at her hut
Lhucu is at her hut, north of Lhan Bach.\n\nYou should return to Lhucu and let her know that the standards have been destroyed.
